channel.title: Lenovo 3000 N200 Laptop
channel.description:
This thing has been sitting in my room since last year. It (was) my dads business laptop, and out of nowhere stopped working. It was at the repair shop for 2 months, then another for a month. Neither solved anything. They even replaced the whole motherboard, thinking it would be a quick fix. Nothing.
-When the power cord is plugged in, the green light on the front shows up -When the power button is clicked. NOTHING happens. No beeps. No fan starting up. NOTHING.
I'll post pics and more later... my dad said it had something to do with the power supply, but could 2 repair shops really not fix the damn thing?

item.title: Lenovo 3000 N200 Laptop
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

That sounds like the kind of thing that happened to my mothers laptop, haven’t fixed it yet though.

Read full topic
